channel.description: Recent content in mesh on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-23
item.description: Spotify Car Thing is a $90 thing that plays Spotify in your car (2 minute read) Spotify has released its Car Thing dashboard smart music player.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-03
item.description: Microsoft Teams enters the metaverse race with 3D avatars and immersive meetings (4 minute read) Microsoft is integrating Mesh directly into Microsoft Teams.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-03
item.description: Microsoft Mesh aims to bring holographic virtual collaboration to all (5 minute read) Microsoft Mesh is Microsoft’s ambitious new attempt at unifying holographic virtual collaboration across multiple devices.
